title: Premium 400ml Transparent Glass Mug with Lid & Straw ? Breakfast Milk Cup, Coffee & Juice Drinkware
description:
Start your mornings with elegance using this Premium 400ml Glass Mug with Lid and Straw. Crafted from high-quality transparent glass, it offers a sleek and modern design perfect for any kitchen or caf? setup. The secure lid helps prevent spills and keeps your beverages fresh, while the eco-friendly reusable straw makes sipping your favorite drink effortless.

Ideal for milk, coffee, tea, juice, smoothies, or cold beverages, this mug combines functionality with style. Its comfortable handle and thick glass construction ensure durability and an enjoyable drinking experience.

Features:

Capacity: 400mlMaterial: Premium Transparent GlassIncludes: Lid & Reusable StrawPerfect for hot or cold drinksEasy to clean and reusableSuitable for home, office, or gifting
